General.Name: Arc Minerals Limited
General.Description: Arc Minerals Limited engages in the identification, evaluation, acquisition, and development of mineral properties in Africa. It holds interests in the Zambia copper and cobalt projects; and 72.5% in the Zaco copper project located in Western part of the Zambian copper belt. Arc Minerals Limited is based in Road Town, British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: Craigmuir Chambers, Road Town, British Virgin Islands, VG 1110
